45 /* set module trace flag */

48 #endif /* LIXA_TRACE_MODULE */
49 #define LIXA_TRACE_MODULE LIXA_TRACE_MOD_XTA

52 
53 xta_transaction_t *xta_transaction_new(void)
54 {
55  enum Exception { G_TRY_MALLOC_ERROR
56  , CLIENT_CONFIG_DUP_ERROR
57  , CLIENT_CONFIG_DISPLAY_ERROR
58  , CLIENT_CONNECT_ERROR
59  , CLIENT_CONFIG_JOB_ERROR
60  , NONE } excp;
61  int ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
62  xta_transaction_t *this = NULL;
63 
64  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_new\n"));
65  TRY {
66  /* allocate the object */
67  if (NULL == (this = (xta_transaction_t *)
68  g_try_malloc0(sizeof(xta_transaction_t))))
69  THROW(G_TRY_MALLOC_ERROR);
70  /* initialize the LIXA client status */
71  client_status_init(&this->client_status);
72  client_status_active(&this->client_status);
73  /*
74  * copy the configuration for the LIXA client from the static one.
75  * Static configuration must be initialized by xta_transaction_manager
76  */
77  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = client_config_dup(
78  &global_ccc, &this->local_ccc)))
79  THROW(CLIENT_CONFIG_DUP_ERROR);
80  /* display on trace the duplicated configuration */
81  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = client_config_display(&this->local_ccc)))
82  THROW(CLIENT_CONFIG_DISPLAY_ERROR);
83  /* connect to LIXA state server */
84  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = client_connect(
85  &this->client_status, &this->local_ccc)))
86  THROW(CLIENT_CONNECT_ERROR);
87  /* configure the LIXA (transactional) job (if necessary) */
88  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = client_config_job(
89  &this->local_ccc,
90  client_status_get_sockfd(
91  &this->client_status))))
92  THROW(CLIENT_CONFIG_JOB_ERROR);
93  /* reset the XID reference */
94  this->xid = NULL;
95  /* reset flag */
96  this->commit_suspended = FALSE;
97 
98  THROW(NONE);
99  } CATCH {
100  switch (excp) {
101  case G_TRY_MALLOC_ERROR:
102  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_G_TRY_MALLOC_ERROR;
103  break;
104  case CLIENT_CONFIG_DUP_ERROR:
105  case CLIENT_CONFIG_DISPLAY_ERROR:
106  case CLIENT_CONNECT_ERROR:
107  case CLIENT_CONFIG_JOB_ERROR:
108  break;
109  case NONE:
110  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_OK;
111  break;
112  default:
113  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
114  } /* switch (excp) */
115  /* if something went wrong, release allocated memory and return
116  NULL */
117  if (excp < NONE) {
118  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_new: an internal error "
119  "occurred, releasing allocated memory...\n"));
120  if (excp > G_TRY_MALLOC_ERROR) {
121  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_new: releasing client "
122  "status objects...\n"));
123  /* free the memory associated to client status */
124  client_status_free(&this->client_status);
125  }
126  if (excp > CLIENT_CONFIG_DUP_ERROR) {
127  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_new: releasing "
128  "configuration objects...\n"));
129  /* free the memory associated to client configuration */
130  client_unconfig(&this->local_ccc, FALSE);
131  }
132  if (excp > G_TRY_MALLOC_ERROR) {
133  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_new: an internal error "
134  "occurred, destroying this object and returning "
135  "NULL\n"));
136  /* free the memory associated to this object */
137  g_free(this);
138  this = NULL;
139  }
140  } /* if (excp < NONE) */
141  } /* TRY-CATCH */
142  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_new/excp=%d/"
143  "ret_cod=%d/errno=%d\n", excp, ret_cod, errno));
144  return this;
145 }
146 
147 
148 
149 void xta_transaction_delete(xta_transaction_t *this)
150 {
151  enum Exception { CLIENT_UNCONFIG_ERROR
152  , NONE } excp;
153  int ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
154 
155  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_delete: destroying %p...\n", this));
156  TRY {
157  /* unconfigure and release the memory related to client configuration
158  collection */
159  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = client_unconfig(&this->local_ccc, FALSE)))
160  THROW(CLIENT_UNCONFIG_ERROR);
161 
162  /* free the memory associated to client status */
163  client_status_free(&this->client_status);
164 
165  /* release the memory of the XID */
166  if (NULL != this->xid)
167  xta_xid_delete(this->xid);
168 
169  /* release the memory of this object */
170  g_free(this);
171 
172  THROW(NONE);
173  } CATCH {
174  switch (excp) {
175  case CLIENT_UNCONFIG_ERROR:
176  break;
177  case NONE:
178  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_OK;
179  break;
180  default:
181  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
182  } /* switch (excp) */
183  } /* TRY-CATCH */
184  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_delete/excp=%d/"
185  "ret_cod=%d/errno=%d\n", excp, ret_cod, errno));
186  return;
187 }

191 xta_transaction_config_t *xta_transaction_get_config(xta_transaction_t *this)
192 {
193  enum Exception { NULL_OBJECT
194  , NONE } excp;
195  int ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
196  client_config_coll_t *ccc = NULL;
197 
198  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_get_config\n"));
199  TRY {
200  if (NULL == this)
201  THROW(NULL_OBJECT);
202  ccc = &this->local_ccc;
203 
204  THROW(NONE);
205  } CATCH {
206  switch (excp) {
207  case NULL_OBJECT:
208  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT;
209  break;
210  case NONE:
211  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_OK;
212  break;
213  default:
214  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
215  } /* switch (excp) */
216  } /* TRY-CATCH */
217  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_get_config/excp=%d/"
218  "ret_cod=%d/errno=%d\n", excp, ret_cod, errno));
219  return ccc;
220 }
221 
222 
223 
224 int xta_transaction_enlist_resource(xta_transaction_t *this,
225  xta_xa_resource_t *xa_res)
226 {
227  enum Exception { NULL_OBJECT1
228  , NULL_OBJECT2
229  , INVALID_STATUS
230  , NULL_OBJECT3
231  , G_TRY_MALLOC_ERROR
232  , CLIENT_CONFIG_DUP_ERROR
233  , REDIGEST_ERROR
234  , XA_RESOURCE_REGISTERED
235  , NONE } excp;
236  int ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
237 
238  const xta_xa_resource_config_t *config = NULL;
239  struct rsrmgr_config_s *rsrmgr = NULL;
240  struct act_rsrmgr_config_s act_rsrmgr;
241 
242  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_enlist_resource\n"));
243  TRY {
244  /* check the transaction object is not NULL */
245  if (NULL == this)
246  THROW(NULL_OBJECT1);
247  /* check the XA Resource object is not NULL */
248  if (NULL == xa_res)
249  THROW(NULL_OBJECT2);
250  /* check transaction state before going on */
251  if (TX_STATE_S0 != client_status_get_txstate(&this->client_status)) {
252  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_enlist_resource: expected client "
253  "status %d, current client status %d\n", TX_STATE_S0,
254  client_status_get_txstate(&this->client_status)));
255  THROW(INVALID_STATUS);
256  }
257  /* if the XA Resource is not dynamic, the following steps are not
258  * necessary */
259  if (xta_xa_resource_is_dynamic(xa_res)) {
260  /* retrieve the configuration related to the XA resource that's
261  * registering to this transaction manager */
262  if (NULL == (config = xta_xa_resource_get_config(xa_res)))
263  THROW(NULL_OBJECT3);
264  /* allocate a new record for the Resource Manager description */
265  if (NULL == (rsrmgr = g_try_malloc(
266  sizeof(struct rsrmgr_config_s))))
267  THROW(G_TRY_MALLOC_ERROR);
268  /* duplicate the configuration structs to avoid dependency from the
269  * resource object (it's necessary to preserve compatibility with
270  * the LIXA legacy non object oriented legacy functions */
271  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = client_config_rsrmgr_dup(
272  config, rsrmgr, &act_rsrmgr)))
273  THROW(CLIENT_CONFIG_DUP_ERROR);
274  /* append the resource manager to the list of actual configured
275  resource managers */
276  client_config_append_rsrmgr(&this->local_ccc, rsrmgr, &act_rsrmgr);
277  /* compute again the configuration digest (fingerprint) because
278  a new resource has been added */
279  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = xta_transaction_redigest(
280  this, config)))
281  THROW(REDIGEST_ERROR);
282  /* reset the record pointer */
283  rsrmgr = NULL;
284  } else {
285  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_enlist_resource: this is a static "
286  "resource, skipping config dup...\n"));
287  } /* if (!xta_xa_resource_is_dynamic(xa_res)) */
288  /* send a registration message to the XA Resource */
289  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = xta_xa_resource_enlisted(
290  xa_res, this)))
291  THROW(XA_RESOURCE_REGISTERED);
292 
293  THROW(NONE);
294  } CATCH {
295  switch (excp) {
296  case NULL_OBJECT1:
297  case NULL_OBJECT2:
298  case NULL_OBJECT3:
299  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT;
300  break;
301  case INVALID_STATUS:
302  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INVALID_STATUS;
303  break;
304  case G_TRY_MALLOC_ERROR:
305  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_G_TRY_MALLOC_ERROR;
306  break;
307  case REDIGEST_ERROR:
308  break;
309  case CLIENT_CONFIG_DUP_ERROR:
310  break;
311  case XA_RESOURCE_REGISTERED:
312  break;
313  case NONE:
314  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_OK;
315  break;
316  default:
317  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
318  } /* switch (excp) */
319  /* recovery memory if necessary */
320  if (NULL != rsrmgr) {
321  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_enlist_resource: recoverying "
322  "record memory\n"));
323  g_free(rsrmgr);
324  }
325  } /* TRY-CATCH */
326  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_enlist_resource/excp=%d/"
327  "ret_cod=%d/errno=%d\n", excp, ret_cod, errno));
328  return ret_cod;
329 }
330 
331 
332 
333 int xta_transaction_redigest(xta_transaction_t *this,
334  const xta_xa_resource_config_t *xrc)
335 {
336  enum Exception { NULL_OBJECT1
337  , NULL_OBJECT2
338  , NULL_OBJECT3
339  , G_CHECKSUM_NEW_ERROR
340  , G_CHECKSUM_GET_STRING_ERROR
341  , JOB_SET_SOURCE_IP_ERROR
342  , NONE } excp;
343  int ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
344  gchar *config_tostring = NULL;
345  GChecksum *checksum = NULL;
346 
347  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_redigest\n"));
348  TRY {
349  const gchar *checksum_string = NULL;
350 
351  /* check the transaction is not NULL */
352  if (NULL == this)
353  THROW(NULL_OBJECT1);
354  /* check the configuration is not NULL */
355  if (NULL == xrc)
356  THROW(NULL_OBJECT2);
357  /* retrieve the serialized version of the configuration */
358  if (NULL == (config_tostring = client_config_tostring_rsrmgr(xrc)))
359  THROW(NULL_OBJECT3);
360  /* trace old values */
361  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_redigest: old digest is '%s'\n",
362  this->local_ccc.config_digest));
363  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_redigest: old job id for this "
364  "transaction is '%s'\n",
365  lixa_job_get_raw(this->local_ccc.job)));
366  /* create a new checksum */
367  if (NULL == (checksum = g_checksum_new(G_CHECKSUM_MD5)))
368  THROW(G_CHECKSUM_NEW_ERROR);
369  /* use current digest as the initial content */
370  g_checksum_update(checksum,
371  (guchar *)this->local_ccc.config_digest,
372  sizeof(md5_digest_hex_t));
373  /* append the config of the current resource */
374  g_checksum_update(checksum, (guchar *)config_tostring,
375  strlen(config_tostring));
376  if (NULL == (checksum_string = g_checksum_get_string(checksum)))
377  THROW(G_CHECKSUM_GET_STRING_ERROR);
378  /* copy back the new digest */
379  strncpy(this->local_ccc.config_digest, (const char *)checksum_string,
380  MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH * 2);
381  this->local_ccc.config_digest[MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH * 2] = '\0';
382  /* re compute LIXA job id for this transaction */
383  lixa_job_reset(this->local_ccc.job);
384  lixa_job_set_config_digest(this->local_ccc.job,
385  this->local_ccc.config_digest);
386  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = lixa_job_set_source_ip(
387  this->local_ccc.job,
388  client_status_get_sockfd(
389  &this->client_status))))
390  THROW(JOB_SET_SOURCE_IP_ERROR);
391  /* trace new values */
392  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_redigest: new digest is '%s'\n",
393  this->local_ccc.config_digest));
394  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_redigest: new job id for this "
395  "transaction is '%s'\n",
396  lixa_job_get_raw(this->local_ccc.job)));
397 
398  THROW(NONE);
399  } CATCH {
400  switch (excp) {
401  case NULL_OBJECT1:
402  case NULL_OBJECT2:
403  case NULL_OBJECT3:
404  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT;
405  break;
406  case G_CHECKSUM_NEW_ERROR:
407  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_G_CHECKSUM_NEW_ERROR;
408  break;
409  case G_CHECKSUM_GET_STRING_ERROR:
410  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_G_CHECKSUM_GET_STRING_ERROR;
411  break;
412  case JOB_SET_SOURCE_IP_ERROR:
413  break;
414  case NONE:
415  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_OK;
416  break;
417  default:
418  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
419  } /* switch (excp) */
420  /* recover dynamically allocated memory */
421  if (NULL != config_tostring)
422  g_free(config_tostring);
423  if (NULL != checksum)
424  g_checksum_free(checksum);
425  } /* TRY-CATCH */
426  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_redigest/excp=%d/"
427  "ret_cod=%d/errno=%d\n", excp, ret_cod, errno));
428  return ret_cod;
429 }
430 
431 
432 
433 int xta_transaction_open(xta_transaction_t *this)
434 {
435  enum Exception { NULL_OBJECT
436  , INVALID_STATUS
437  , LIXA_XA_OPEN_ERROR
438  , INTERNAL_ERROR
439  , NONE } excp;
440  int ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
441 
442  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_open\n"));
443  TRY {
444  int next_txstate, txrc;
445 
446  /* check object */
447  if (NULL == this)
448  THROW(NULL_OBJECT);
449  /* check transaction state before going on */
450  if (TX_STATE_S0 != client_status_get_txstate(&this->client_status)) {
451  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_open: expected client status %d, "
452  "current client status %d\n", TX_STATE_S0,
453  client_status_get_txstate(&this->client_status)));
454  THROW(INVALID_STATUS);
455  }
456  next_txstate = TX_STATE_S1;
457  /* open statically defined XA Resource Managers */
458  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = lixa_xa_open(
459  &this->local_ccc, &this->client_status,
460  &txrc, next_txstate, FALSE)))
461  THROW(LIXA_XA_OPEN_ERROR);
462  /* set new state after RMs are open... */
463  client_status_set_txstate(&this->client_status, next_txstate);
464 
465  /* this should never happen! */
466  if (NULL != this->xid)
467  THROW(INTERNAL_ERROR);
468 
469  THROW(NONE);
470  } CATCH {
471  switch (excp) {
472  case NULL_OBJECT:
473  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT;
474  break;
475  case INVALID_STATUS:
476  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INVALID_STATUS;
477  break;
478  case LIXA_XA_OPEN_ERROR:
479  break;
480  case INTERNAL_ERROR:
481  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
482  break;
483  case NONE:
484  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_OK;
485  break;
486  default:
487  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
488  } /* switch (excp) */
489  } /* TRY-CATCH */
490  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_open/excp=%d/"
491  "ret_cod=%d/errno=%d\n", excp, ret_cod, errno));
492  return ret_cod;
493 }
494 
495 
496 
497 int xta_transaction_close(xta_transaction_t *this)
498 {
499  enum Exception { NULL_OBJECT
500  , PROTOCOL_ERROR
501  , INVALID_STATUS
502  , LIXA_XA_CLOSE_ERROR
503  , NONE } excp;
504  int ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
505 
506  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_close\n"));
507  TRY {
508  int txstate, next_txstate, txrc;
509 
510  /* check object */
511  if (NULL == this)
512  THROW(NULL_OBJECT);
513  /* check transaction state before going on */
514  txstate = client_status_get_txstate(&this->client_status);
515  switch (txstate) {
516  case TX_STATE_S0:
517  case TX_STATE_S1:
518  break;
519  case TX_STATE_S3:
520  THROW(PROTOCOL_ERROR);
521  case TX_STATE_S5:
522  break;
523  default:
524  THROW(INVALID_STATUS);
525  }
526 
527  next_txstate = TX_STATE_S1;
528  /* close statically defined XA Resource Managers */
529  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = lixa_xa_close(
530  &this->local_ccc, &this->client_status,
531  &txrc)))
532  THROW(LIXA_XA_CLOSE_ERROR);
533  /* set new state after RMs are open... */
534  client_status_set_txstate(&this->client_status, next_txstate);
535  txstate = next_txstate;
536  next_txstate = TX_STATE_S3;
537 
538  THROW(NONE);
539  } CATCH {
540  switch (excp) {
541  case NULL_OBJECT:
542  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT;
543  break;
544  case PROTOCOL_ERROR:
545  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_PROTOCOL_ERROR;
546  break;
547  case INVALID_STATUS:
548  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INVALID_STATUS;
549  break;
550  case LIXA_XA_CLOSE_ERROR:
551  break;
552  case NONE:
553  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_OK;
554  break;
555  default:
556  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
557  } /* switch (excp) */
558  } /* TRY-CATCH */
559  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_close/excp=%d/"
560  "ret_cod=%d/errno=%d\n", excp, ret_cod, errno));
561  return ret_cod;
562 }
563 
564 
565 
566 int xta_transaction_start(xta_transaction_t *this, int multiple_branches)
567 {
568  enum Exception { NULL_OBJECT1
569  , INVALID_STATUS
570  , NULL_OBJECT2
571  , LIXA_XA_START_ERROR
572  , NONE } excp;
573  int ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
574 
575  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_start\n"));
576  TRY {
577  int txstate, next_txstate, dupid_or_proto = FALSE;
578  int txrc = 0;
579 
580  /* check object */
581  if (NULL == this)
582  THROW(NULL_OBJECT1);
583 
584  /* check TX state */
585  txstate = client_status_get_txstate(&this->client_status);
586  if (TX_STATE_S1 != txstate) {
587  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_start: expected client status %d, "
588  "current client status %d\n", TX_STATE_S1, txstate));
589  THROW(INVALID_STATUS);
590  } else
591  next_txstate = TX_STATE_S3;
592  /* create a new xid */
593  if (NULL == (this->xid = xta_xid_new(this->local_ccc.config_digest,
594  multiple_branches)))
595  THROW(NULL_OBJECT2);
596  /* start the transaction in all the XA Resource Managers */
597  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = lixa_xa_start(
598  &this->local_ccc, &this->client_status,
599  &txrc,
600  xta_xid_get_xa_xid(this->xid), txstate,
601  next_txstate, &dupid_or_proto, TMNOFLAGS)))
602  THROW(LIXA_XA_START_ERROR);
603  /* update the TX state */
604  client_status_set_txstate(&this->client_status, next_txstate);
605 
606  THROW(NONE);
607  } CATCH {
608  switch (excp) {
609  case NULL_OBJECT1:
610  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT;
611  break;
612  case INVALID_STATUS:
613  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INVALID_STATUS;
614  break;
615  case NULL_OBJECT2:
616  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT;
617  break;
618  case LIXA_XA_START_ERROR:
619  break;
620  case NONE:
621  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_OK;
622  break;
623  default:
624  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
625  } /* switch (excp) */
626  } /* TRY-CATCH */
627  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_start/excp=%d/"
628  "ret_cod=%d/errno=%d\n", excp, ret_cod, errno));
629  return ret_cod;
630 }
631 
632 
633 
634 int xta_transaction_commit(xta_transaction_t *this, int non_block)
635 {
636  enum Exception { NULL_OBJECT
637  , INVALID_STATUS
638  , GET_BQUAL_ASCII
639  , LIXA_XA_END_ERROR
640  , LIXA_XA_PREPARE_WAIT_BRANCHES_ERROR
641  , COMMIT_SUSPENDED
642  , LIXA_XA_PREPARE_ERROR
643  , LIXA_XA_COMMIT_ERROR
644  , INVALID_STATE1
645  , INVALID_TXRC1
646  , LIXA_XA_ROLLBACK_ERROR
647  , INVALID_STATE2
648  , INVALID_TXRC2
649  , LIXA_XA_FORGET_ERROR
650  , NONE } excp;
651  int ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
652  char *bqual = NULL;
653 
654  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_commit\n"));
655  int txrc = TX_OK;
656  TRY {
657  int one_phase_commit = FALSE, commit = TRUE, finished = TRUE;
658  int txstate, prepare_txrc, next_txstate;
659 
660  /* check object */
661  if (NULL == this)
662  THROW(NULL_OBJECT);
663  /* check TX state */
664  txstate = client_status_get_txstate(&this->client_status);
665  if (TX_STATE_S3 != txstate) {
666  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_commit: expected client status %d, "
667  "current client status %d\n", TX_STATE_S3, txstate));
668  THROW(INVALID_STATUS);
669  }
670  if (this->commit_suspended) {
671  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_commit: a previously suspended "
672  "commit must be completed\n"));
673  } else {
674  /* check if One Phase Commit optimization can be applied */
675  one_phase_commit = (client_status_could_one_phase(
676  &this->client_status, &this->local_ccc));
677  if (one_phase_commit) {
678  /* check if the transaction has been create with the multiple
679  branches option */
680  if (NULL == (bqual = lixa_xid_get_bqual_ascii(
681  xta_xid_get_xa_xid(this->xid))))
682  THROW(GET_BQUAL_ASCII);
683  if (xta_xid_branch_qualifier_is_multibranch(bqual)) {
684  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_commit: forcing "
685  "one_phase_commit to FALSE because the branch "
686  "qualifier (%s) of this transaction is "
687  "related to a multiple branches transaction\n",
688  bqual));
689  one_phase_commit = FALSE;
690  }
691  } /* if (one_phase_commit) */
692  /* detach the transaction */
693  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = lixa_xa_end(
694  &this->local_ccc, &this->client_status,
695  xta_xid_get_xa_xid(this->xid), &txrc,
696  commit, TMSUCCESS))) {
697  if (TX_ROLLBACK == txrc)
698  commit = FALSE;
699  else
700  THROW(LIXA_XA_END_ERROR);
701  } /* if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = lixa_xa_end( */
702  } /* if (this->commit_suspended) */
703  /* prepare (skip if we are rollbacking) */
704  if (commit) {
705  /* check if multiple branches prepare must be waited */
706  if (this->commit_suspended) {
707  ret_cod = lixa_xa_prepare_wait_branches(
708  &this->local_ccc, &this->client_status);
709  if (LIXA_RC_OTHER_BRANCH_ERROR == ret_cod) {
710  /* force rollback */
711  txrc = TX_ROLLBACK;
712  commit = FALSE;
713  } else if (LIXA_RC_OK != ret_cod)
714  THROW(LIXA_XA_PREPARE_WAIT_BRANCHES_ERROR);
715  } else if (!one_phase_commit) {
716  /* bypass xa_prepare if one_phase_commit is TRUE or xa_prepare
717  * has been already performed in the previous suspended commit */
718  ret_cod = lixa_xa_prepare(
719  &this->local_ccc, &this->client_status,
720  xta_xid_get_xa_xid(this->xid), non_block,
721  &txrc, &commit);
722  switch (ret_cod) {
723  case LIXA_RC_OK:
724  break;
725  case LIXA_RC_WOULD_BLOCK:
726  this->commit_suspended = TRUE;
727  THROW(COMMIT_SUSPENDED);
728  break;
729  case LIXA_RC_OTHER_BRANCH_ERROR: /* force rollback */
730  txrc = TX_ROLLBACK;
731  commit = FALSE;
732  break;
733  default:
734  THROW(LIXA_XA_PREPARE_ERROR);
735  } /* switch (ret_cod) */
736  } /* if (!one_phase_commit) */
737  } /* if (commit) */
738  prepare_txrc = txrc;
739  /* commit or rollback the transaction */
740  if (commit) {
741  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_commit: go on with commit...\n"));
742  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = lixa_xa_commit(
743  &this->local_ccc, &this->client_status,
744  xta_xid_get_xa_xid(this->xid),
745  &txrc, one_phase_commit)))
746  THROW(LIXA_XA_COMMIT_ERROR);
747  switch (txrc) {
748  case TX_OK:
749  case TX_ROLLBACK:
750  case TX_ERROR:
751  case TX_MIXED:
752  case TX_HAZARD:
753  next_txstate = TX_STATE_S1;
754  break;
755  case TX_NO_BEGIN:
756  case TX_ROLLBACK_NO_BEGIN:
757  case TX_MIXED_NO_BEGIN:
758  case TX_HAZARD_NO_BEGIN:
759  THROW(INVALID_STATE1);
760  break;
761  case TX_FAIL:
762  next_txstate = txstate;
763  finished = FALSE;
764  break;
765  default:
766  THROW(INVALID_TXRC1);
767  } /* switch */
768  } else {
769  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_commit: go on with rollback...\n"));
770  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = lixa_xa_rollback(
771  &this->local_ccc, &this->client_status,
772  xta_xid_get_xa_xid(this->xid),
773  &txrc, TRUE)))
774  THROW(LIXA_XA_ROLLBACK_ERROR);
775  if (TX_FAIL == prepare_txrc) {
776  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_commit: txrc=%d, "
777  "prepare_txrc=%d, "
778  "returning TX_FAIL to Application Program\n",
779  txrc, prepare_txrc));
780  txrc = TX_FAIL;
781  }
782  switch (txrc) {
783  case TX_OK:
784  case TX_ROLLBACK:
785  case TX_MIXED:
786  case TX_HAZARD:
787  next_txstate = TX_STATE_S1;
788  break;
789  case TX_NO_BEGIN:
790  case TX_ROLLBACK_NO_BEGIN:
791  case TX_MIXED_NO_BEGIN:
792  case TX_HAZARD_NO_BEGIN:
793  case TX_COMMITTED_NO_BEGIN:
794  THROW(INVALID_STATE2);
795  break;
796  case TX_FAIL:
797  next_txstate = txstate;
798  finished = FALSE;
799  break;
800  default:
801  THROW(INVALID_TXRC2);
802  } /* switch */
803  } /* else */
804 
805  /* clean Heurstically Completed states... */
806  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = lixa_xa_forget(
807  &this->local_ccc, &this->client_status,
808  xta_xid_get_xa_xid(this->xid), finished)))
809  THROW(LIXA_XA_FORGET_ERROR);
810 
811  /* update the TX state, now TX_STATE_S0 */
812  client_status_set_txstate(&this->client_status, next_txstate);
813  /* reset the transaction id */
814  xta_xid_reset(this->xid);
815 
816  THROW(NONE);
817  } CATCH {
818  switch (excp) {
819  case NULL_OBJECT:
820  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT;
821  break;
822  case INVALID_STATUS:
823  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INVALID_STATUS;
824  break;
825  case GET_BQUAL_ASCII:
826  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT;
827  break;
828  case LIXA_XA_END_ERROR:
829  case LIXA_XA_PREPARE_WAIT_BRANCHES_ERROR:
830  case LIXA_XA_PREPARE_ERROR:
831  case COMMIT_SUSPENDED:
832  case LIXA_XA_COMMIT_ERROR:
833  break;
834  case INVALID_STATE1:
835  case INVALID_TXRC1:
836  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INVALID_STATUS;
837  break;
838  case LIXA_XA_ROLLBACK_ERROR:
839  break;
840  case INVALID_STATE2:
841  case INVALID_TXRC2:
842  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INVALID_STATUS;
843  break;
844  case LIXA_XA_FORGET_ERROR:
845  break;
846  case NONE:
847  switch (txrc) {
848  case TX_OK:
849  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_OK;
850  break;
851  case TX_ROLLBACK:
852  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_TX_ROLLBACK;
853  break;
854  case TX_MIXED:
855  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_TX_MIXED;
856  break;
857  case TX_HAZARD:
858  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_TX_HAZARD;
859  break;
860  default:
861  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
862  } /* switch (txrc) */
863  break;
864  default:
865  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
866  } /* switch (excp) */
867  /* LIXA backward compatibility, but it might be useless */
868  if (TX_FAIL == txrc && NULL != &this->client_status)
869  client_status_failed(&this->client_status);
870  } /* TRY-CATCH */
871  /* memory recovery */
872  if (NULL != bqual) {
873  free(bqual);
874  bqual = NULL;
875  }
876  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_commit/excp=%d/"
877  "ret_cod=%d/errno=%d\n", excp, ret_cod, errno));
878  return ret_cod;
879 }
880 
881 
882 
883 int xta_transaction_rollback(xta_transaction_t *this)
884 {
885  enum Exception { NULL_OBJECT
886  , INVALID_STATUS
887  , LIXA_XA_END_ERROR
888  , LIXA_XA_ROLLBACK_ERROR
889  , INVALID_STATE
890  , INVALID_TXRC
891  , LIXA_XA_FORGET_ERROR
892  , NONE } excp;
893  int ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
894 
895  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_rollback\n"));
896  int txrc = TX_OK;
897  TRY {
898  int txstate, next_txstate, finished = TRUE;
899 
900  /* check object */
901  if (NULL == this)
902  THROW(NULL_OBJECT);
903  /* check TX state */
904  txstate = client_status_get_txstate(&this->client_status);
905  if (TX_STATE_S3 != txstate) {
906  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_commit: expected client status %d, "
907  "current client status %d\n", TX_STATE_S3, txstate));
908  THROW(INVALID_STATUS);
909  }
910  /* detach the transaction */
911  ret_cod = lixa_xa_end(&this->local_ccc, &this->client_status,
912  xta_xid_get_xa_xid(this->xid), &txrc,
913  FALSE, TMSUCCESS);
914  if (LIXA_RC_OK != ret_cod && TX_ROLLBACK != txrc)
915  THROW(LIXA_XA_END_ERROR);
916  /* rollback the transaction */
917  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = lixa_xa_rollback(
918  &this->local_ccc, &this->client_status,
919  xta_xid_get_xa_xid(this->xid), &txrc, FALSE)))
920  THROW(LIXA_XA_ROLLBACK_ERROR);
921  switch (txrc) {
922  case TX_OK:
923  case TX_MIXED:
924  case TX_HAZARD:
925  case TX_COMMITTED:
926  case TX_ERROR:
927  next_txstate = TX_STATE_S1;
928  break;
929  case TX_NO_BEGIN:
930  case TX_MIXED_NO_BEGIN:
931  case TX_HAZARD_NO_BEGIN:
932  case TX_COMMITTED_NO_BEGIN:
933  THROW(INVALID_STATE);
934  break;
935  case TX_FAIL:
936  next_txstate = txstate;
937  finished = FALSE;
938  break;
939  default:
940  THROW(INVALID_TXRC);
941  } /* switch */
942 
943  /* clean Heurstically Completed states... */
944  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = lixa_xa_forget(
945  &this->local_ccc, &this->client_status,
946  xta_xid_get_xa_xid(this->xid), finished)))
947  THROW(LIXA_XA_FORGET_ERROR);
948 
949  /* update the TX state, now TX_STATE_S0 */
950  client_status_set_txstate(&this->client_status, next_txstate);
951  /* reset the transaction id */
952  xta_xid_reset(this->xid);
953 
954  THROW(NONE);
955  } CATCH {
956  switch (excp) {
957  case NULL_OBJECT:
958  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT;
959  break;
960  case INVALID_STATUS:
961  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INVALID_STATUS;
962  break;
963  case LIXA_XA_END_ERROR:
964  case LIXA_XA_ROLLBACK_ERROR:
965  break;
966  case INVALID_STATE:
967  case INVALID_TXRC:
968  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INVALID_STATUS;
969  break;
970  case LIXA_XA_FORGET_ERROR:
971  break;
972  case NONE:
973  switch (txrc) {
974  case TX_OK:
975  case TX_ROLLBACK:
976  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_OK;
977  break;
978  case TX_MIXED:
979  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_TX_MIXED;
980  break;
981  case TX_HAZARD:
982  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_TX_HAZARD;
983  break;
984  default:
985  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
986  } /* switch (txrc) */
987  break;
988  default:
989  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
990  } /* switch (excp) */
991  } /* TRY-CATCH */
992  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_rollback/excp=%d/"
993  "ret_cod=%d/errno=%d\n", excp, ret_cod, errno));
994  return ret_cod;
995 }
996 
997 
998 
999 int xta_transaction_suspend(xta_transaction_t *this, long flags)
1000 {
1001  enum Exception { NULL_OBJECT
1002  , PROTOCOL_ERROR
1003  , INVALID_STATUS
1004  , INVALID_FLAGS
1005  , LIXA_XA_END_ERROR
1006  , NONE } excp;
1007  int ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
1008 
1009  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_suspend\n"));
1010  TRY {
1011  int txstate, next_txstate, txrc;
1012 
1013  /* check object */
1014  if (NULL == this)
1015  THROW(NULL_OBJECT);
1016  /* check transaction state before going on */
1017  txstate = client_status_get_txstate(&this->client_status);
1018  switch (txstate) {
1019  case TX_STATE_S0:
1020  case TX_STATE_S1:
1021  THROW(PROTOCOL_ERROR);
1022  case TX_STATE_S3:
1023  break;
1024  default:
1025  THROW(INVALID_STATUS);
1026  }
1027  /* check flags */
1028  if (TMMIGRATE == flags) {
1029  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_suspend: flags=TMMIGRATE, "
1030  "suspend for resume\n"));
1031  } else if (TMNOFLAGS == flags) {
1032  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_suspend: flags=TMNOFLAGS, "
1033  "suspend for join\n"));
1034  } else
1035  THROW(INVALID_FLAGS);
1036  /* add suspend flag */
1037  flags |= TMSUSPEND;
1038  /* detach the transaction */
1039  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = lixa_xa_end(
1040  &this->local_ccc, &this->client_status,
1041  xta_xid_get_xa_xid(this->xid), &txrc,
1042  FALSE, flags)))
1043  THROW(LIXA_XA_END_ERROR);
1044 
1045  next_txstate = TX_STATE_S5;
1046  /* set new state after RMs are suspended... */
1047  client_status_set_txstate(&this->client_status, next_txstate);
1048 
1049  THROW(NONE);
1050  } CATCH {
1051  switch (excp) {
1052  case NULL_OBJECT:
1053  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT;
1054  break;
1055  case PROTOCOL_ERROR:
1056  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_PROTOCOL_ERROR;
1057  break;
1058  case INVALID_STATUS:
1059  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INVALID_STATUS;
1060  break;
1061  case INVALID_FLAGS:
1062  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INVALID_OPTION;
1063  break;
1064  case LIXA_XA_END_ERROR:
1065  break;
1066  case NONE:
1067  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_OK;
1068  break;
1069  default:
1070  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
1071  } /* switch (excp) */
1072  } /* TRY-CATCH */
1073  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_suspend/excp=%d/"
1074  "ret_cod=%d/errno=%d\n", excp, ret_cod, errno));
1075  return ret_cod;
1076 }
1077 
1078 
1079 
1080 int xta_transaction_resume(xta_transaction_t *this,
1081  const char *xid_string, long flags)
1082 {
1083  enum Exception { NULL_OBJECT1
1084  , INVALID_STATUS
1085  , PROTOCOL_ERROR
1086  , INVALID_FLAGS
1087  , NULL_OBJECT2
1088  , LIXA_XA_START_ERROR
1089  , NONE } excp;
1090  int ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
1091 
1092  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_resume\n"));
1093  TRY {
1094  int txstate, next_txstate, dupid_or_proto = FALSE;
1095  int txrc = 0;
1096 
1097  /* check object and serialized XID */
1098  if (NULL == this || NULL == xid_string)
1099  THROW(NULL_OBJECT1);
1100  /* check current XID is not set */
1101  if (NULL != this->xid)
1102  THROW(INVALID_STATUS);
1103  /* check transaction state before going on */
1104  txstate = client_status_get_txstate(&this->client_status);
1105  switch (txstate) {
1106  case TX_STATE_S0:
1107  case TX_STATE_S3:
1108  THROW(PROTOCOL_ERROR);
1109  case TX_STATE_S1:
1110  case TX_STATE_S5:
1111  break;
1112  default:
1113  THROW(PROTOCOL_ERROR);
1114  }
1115  next_txstate = TX_STATE_S3;
1116  /* check flags */
1117  if (TMRESUME == flags) {
1118  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_resume: flags=TMRESUME, "
1119  "resuming after possible migration\n"));
1120  } else if (TMJOIN == flags) {
1121  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_resume: flags=TMJOIN, "
1122  "joining an existent transaction\n"));
1123  } else
1124  THROW(INVALID_FLAGS);
1125  /* deserialize the passed XID */
1126  if (NULL == (this->xid = xta_xid_new_from_string(xid_string)))
1127  THROW(NULL_OBJECT2);
1128  /* start the transaction in all the XA Resource Managers */
1129  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (ret_cod = lixa_xa_start(
1130  &this->local_ccc, &this->client_status,
1131  &txrc,
1132  xta_xid_get_xa_xid(this->xid), txstate,
1133  next_txstate, &dupid_or_proto, flags)))
1134  THROW(LIXA_XA_START_ERROR);
1135  /* update the TX state */
1136  client_status_set_txstate(&this->client_status, next_txstate);
1137 
1138  THROW(NONE);
1139  } CATCH {
1140  switch (excp) {
1141  case NULL_OBJECT1:
1142  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT;
1143  break;
1144  case INVALID_STATUS:
1145  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INVALID_STATUS;
1146  break;
1147  case PROTOCOL_ERROR:
1148  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_PROTOCOL_ERROR;
1149  break;
1150  case INVALID_FLAGS:
1151  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INVALID_OPTION;
1152  break;
1153  case NULL_OBJECT2:
1154  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT;
1155  break;
1156  case LIXA_XA_START_ERROR:
1157  break;
1158  case NONE:
1159  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_OK;
1160  break;
1161  default:
1162  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
1163  } /* switch (excp) */
1164  } /* TRY-CATCH */
1165  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_resume/excp=%d/"
1166  "ret_cod=%d/errno=%d\n", excp, ret_cod, errno));
1167  return ret_cod;
1168 }
1169 
1170 
1171 
1172 int xta_transaction_branch(xta_transaction_t *this, const char *xid_string)
1173 {
1174  enum Exception { NULL_OBJECT1
1175  , INVALID_STATUS
1176  , XID_DESERIALIZE
1177  , GET_BQUAL_ASCII
1178  , NON_BRANCHABLE_TX
1179  , XID_SERIALIZE
1180  , NULL_OBJECT2
1181  , LIXA_XA_START_ERROR
1182  , NONE } excp;
1183  int ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
1184  int warning = LIXA_RC_OK;
1185  char *bqual = NULL;
1186 
1187  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_branch\n"));
1188  TRY {
1189  XID superior, subordinate;
1190  lixa_ser_xid_t lsx;
1191  int txstate, next_txstate, dupid_or_proto = FALSE;
1192  int txrc = 0;
1193 
1194  /* check object */
1195  if (NULL == this)
1196  THROW(NULL_OBJECT1);
1197 
1198  /* check TX state */
1199  txstate = client_status_get_txstate(&this->client_status);
1200  if (TX_STATE_S1 != txstate) {
1201  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_branch: expected client status %d, "
1202  "current client status %d\n", TX_STATE_S1, txstate));
1203  THROW(INVALID_STATUS);
1204  } else
1205  next_txstate = TX_STATE_S3;
1206 
1207  /* deserialize superior XID */
1208  if (!lixa_xid_deserialize(&superior, xid_string)) {
1209  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_branch: unable to deserialize "
1210  "superior XID '%s'\n", xid_string));
1211  THROW(XID_DESERIALIZE);
1212  }
1213  /* retrieve the branch qualifier to check it's for multiple branches */
1214  if (NULL == (bqual = lixa_xid_get_bqual_ascii(&superior)))
1215  THROW(GET_BQUAL_ASCII);
1216  if (!xta_xid_branch_qualifier_is_multibranch(bqual)) {
1217  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_branch: this transaction "
1218  "(xid=%s) can't be branched because bqual (%s) is "
1219  "related to a non branchable transaction\n",
1220  xid_string, bqual));
1221  syslog(LOG_ERR, LIXA_SYSLOG_LXC031E, xid_string, bqual);
1222  THROW(NON_BRANCHABLE_TX);
1223  }
1224  /* generate subordinate XID */
1225  lixa_xid_branch_new(&superior, &subordinate);
1226  /* serialize subordiante XID */
1227  if (!lixa_xid_serialize(&subordinate, lsx)) {
1228  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_branch: unable to serialize "
1229  "subordinate XID\n"));
1230  THROW(XID_SERIALIZE);
1231  }
1232  /* debug message */
1233  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_branch: superior XID is '%s', "
1234  "subordinate XID is '%s'\n", xid_string, lsx));
1235  /* create a new xid */
1236  if (NULL == (this->xid = xta_xid_new_from_XID(&subordinate)))
1237  THROW(NULL_OBJECT2);
1238  /* start the transaction in all the XA Resource Managers as a new
1239  * branch under the scope of an existing global transaction */
1240  ret_cod = lixa_xa_start(&this->local_ccc, &this->client_status,
1241  &txrc,
1242  xta_xid_get_xa_xid(this->xid), txstate,
1243  next_txstate, &dupid_or_proto, TMXTABRANCH);
1244  switch (ret_cod) {
1245  case LIXA_RC_OK:
1246  break;
1247  case LIXA_RC_NO_SUPERIOR_BRANCH:
1248  /* set the warning condition, but the transaction can go on */
1249  warning = ret_cod;
1250  break;
1251  default:
1252  THROW(LIXA_XA_START_ERROR);
1253  } /* switch (ret_cod) */
1254  /* update the TX state */
1255  client_status_set_txstate(&this->client_status, next_txstate);
1256 
1257  THROW(NONE);
1258  } CATCH {
1259  switch (excp) {
1260  case NULL_OBJECT1:
1261  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT;
1262  break;
1263  case INVALID_STATUS:
1264  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INVALID_STATUS;
1265  break;
1266  case XID_DESERIALIZE:
1267  case XID_SERIALIZE:
1268  case GET_BQUAL_ASCII:
1269  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_MALFORMED_XID;
1270  break;
1271  case NON_BRANCHABLE_TX:
1272  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_NON_BRANCHABLE_TX;
1273  break;
1274  case NULL_OBJECT2:
1275  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT;
1276  break;
1277  case LIXA_XA_START_ERROR:
1278  break;
1279  case NONE:
1280  ret_cod = warning;
1281  break;
1282  default:
1283  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
1284  } /* switch (excp) */
1285  } /* TRY-CATCH */
1286  /* memory recovery */
1287  if (NULL != bqual) {
1288  free(bqual);
1289  bqual = NULL;
1290  }
1291  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_branch/excp=%d/"
1292  "ret_cod=%d/errno=%d\n", excp, ret_cod, errno));
1293  return ret_cod;
1294 }
1295 
1296 
1297 
1298 const xta_xid_t *xta_transaction_get_xid(const xta_transaction_t *this)
1299 {
1300  enum Exception { NULL_OBJECT
1301  , NONE } excp;
1302  int ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
1303  xta_xid_t *xid = NULL;
1304 
1305  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_get_xid\n"));
1306  TRY {
1307  if (NULL == this)
1308  THROW(NULL_OBJECT);
1309  xid = this->xid;
1310 
1311  THROW(NONE);
1312  } CATCH {
1313  switch (excp) {
1314  case NULL_OBJECT:
1315  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT;
1316  break;
1317  case NONE:
1318  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_OK;
1319  break;
1320  default:
1321  ret_cod = LIXA_RC_INTERNAL_ERROR;
1322  } /* switch (excp) */
1323  } /* TRY-CATCH */
1324  LIXA_TRACE(("xta_transaction_get_xid/excp=%d/"
1325  "ret_cod=%d/errno=%d\n", excp, ret_cod, errno));
1326  return xid;
1327 }
